![](https://i.imgur.com/d7bSzo0.jpg) (C) by pixabay and modified by @detlev for #beersaturday We are week **292 of the BEER and fun challenge** and it is time for you to join the beery fun. Each week we call everyone worldwide to show us some of their favourite beer and their stories about that beer. --- # ![](https://images.hive.blog/100x0/https://i.imgur.com/2wCKc4z.png) The Weekly BeerSaturday Challenge ### The Challenge It's very simple: **share YOUR STORY about one of your favourite beer.** This is your chance to blog about **beer**, earn tokens, and why not use them to buy another beer for the next challenge. ### The Prizes **This week, we will give away 14 HIVE - 16 BEER - 2 LEO - 500 Ecency POINTS** You may also get some upvotes from us and our sponsors on your posts and comments as a bonus! Here is how our tokens will be distributed: ||HIVE|BEER|LEO|POINTS| |:-----------------: |:-----: |-|-|-| |Prize 1|6 HIVE|7 BEER|1 LEO|250 POINTS| |Prize 2|5 HIVE|5 BEER|1 LEO|250 POINTS| |Prize 3|3 HIVE|3 BEER||| _Prizes are drawn at random and each participant can only win one prize per week._ ### The Rules **1**. Create a post about on the beer topic Your post must : * contain at least **3 pictures** related to **beer** (feel free to add more) * contain a **story about beer** with **200+ words** * use the Hashtag **#BeerSaturday** **2**. Add a **comment onto this post** with the **link of your new post**. ***Remarks:*** - You may post on any day of the week - You can publish more than one post - The challenge ends on Thursday midnight UTC - Winnter will be announced on Friday. It's all about **quality content** and boosting this #BeerSaturday Challenge. --- ### ![](https://images.hive.blog/80x0/https://i.imgur.com/Zw8hCGo.png) Mention and invite a friend Add the following line to your message, but replace @username with the name of one of your friends. > This is #BeerSaturday week and I would like to invite @username to write a post in any language about beer with at least 3 pictures. We know you can handle this job as well as **reblog** this weekly post ;-) ## ![](https://images.hive.blog/80x0/https://i.imgur.com/u7CqWo0.png) The BEER community Yes, we have a great beer community on Hive with around **1923 members**. Be part of it! Click [**here**](https://peakd.com/c/hive-187719/created) and subscribe to the [**Beer Community!**](https://peakd.com/c/hive-187719/created) You can also joing our **Beer Community Server** on [**Discord**](https://discord.gg/Ub3pjBk). ## ![](https://images.hive.blog/80x0/https://i.imgur.com/w1RCj9U.png) The Honourable Community Members since so many week we run this challenge and therefore we have to say a big **BIG THANK YOU** Many thanks again to @zekepickleman @harveyword @muelli @jeffjagoe @seckorama @rynow @ynwa.andree @johnspalding @handofzara @melbourneswest @cryptictruth @borran @jacobtothe @pundito @mdosev @article61 @svanbo for your support for such a long time and all the beer you have to drink for us.... ##
A BIG BIG THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS!

Many thanks to @arcange, @pfunk, @balte, @alexvan, @cryptobrewmaster, @louis88 and @melinda010100 for their POWERFUL support. *PS: If you have a token, a community, a game or anything else on Hive and you like to sponsor the #BeerSaturday challenge, feel free to contact me on Discord #or drop a comment.* ## Support our Witnesses I'm running the new [**detlev.witness**](https://vote.hive.uno/@detlev.witness). Your support is welcome, It's just a few clicks! You may also consider voting for those great witnesses: [arcange](https://vote.hive.uno/@arcange), [pfunk](https://vote.hive.uno/@pfunk) and [louis.witness](https://vote.hive.uno/@louis.witness). --- **Special thanks to everyone who upvoted the #BeerSaturday posts lately** @ablaze @ace108 @alexvan @beerlover @besheda @blue.rabbit @brewery @broxi @condeas @dachcolony @dalersilfver @dcityrewards @director.rar @dirkzett @dlike @dreimaldad @drricksanchez @edwardstobia @eisenbart @exyle @ezzy @fog043 @gerber @harveyword @hivewatchers @hopbrothers @jagoe @jeffjagoe @kissi @leomolina @leone.bianco @leprechaun @louis.random @louis88 @lrekt01 @meesterbrain @megstarbies @mice-k @mister.reatard @musicgeek @nicollefiallo @pet.society @photobook @potpourry @primalamusica @psicologiaexpres @psionic-tremors @pungdaler @ribary @rivalzzz @rynow @scoutroc @sd974201 @shrazi.hold @sportschain @steem.leo @sunsea @szf @tixinhacapitinha @uwelang @victor-alexander @visionarystudios @wharfagein @xchng ## Looking forward to seeing your Beer posts this week _Yра -Saludos - Bodoh - Cheers - Prost - 欢呼声 - dzięki - 乾杯 - спасибо - proost - наздраве - aplausos_ ---
